title: Stocks Close at Record, Nudged Higher as Cook Buys Nike Shares
description: Stocks closed out their longest winning streak since November on Wednesday, in thin holiday trading as investors parsed labor market data for additional clues on the Federal Reserve’s interest rate path.
content: Stocks closed out their longest winning streak since November on Wednesday, in thin holiday trading as investors parsed labor market data for additional clues on the Federal Reserve’s interest rate path.
